TextView.android:text:
- **Objective:** Get a higher score than the CPU.
- **Setup:** Each player starts with 10 cards, and 8 cards are placed on the field.
- **How to Play:** 1. Play a card from your hand. If it matches the month of a card on the field, you capture both. 2. A card is then automatically flipped from the deck. If it matches a card on the field, you capture those as well.
- **Scoring (Simplified):** • Brights: Score points starting from 3 cards. • Animals: Score points starting from 5 cards. • Ribbons: Score points starting from 5 cards. • Junk: Score points starting from 10 cards. * Special combinations (Yaks) like Godori, Hongdan, etc., are not included in this version.
- **Go/Stop:** • When you capture 7 or more cards, you can choose to 'Go' (continue the round) or 'Stop' (end the round).
